newsitem.title: UK: Merrill prices 4-tranche asset-backed dollar FRN.
newsitem.headline: Merrill prices 4-tranche asset-backed dollar FRN.

text.p: Merrill Lynch has priced a four-tranche asset-backed dollar FRN it launched for Household Consumer Loan Trust 1996-2 on Tuesday.
CLASS A1
AMT $794 MLN IND SPREAD +17* LEG MAT 15.AUG.06
TYPE FRN BASE 1M LIBOR PAY DATE 27.AUG.96
LAST MOODY AAA ISS PRICE PAR FULL FEES 0.18
LAST S&P AAA REOFFER PAR EXP MAT 15.JAN.03
MGT/UND 0.06 SELL CONC 0.12 AVE LIFE 2.39 YRS
NOTES *13.0 PCT CAP
